title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Tuna Environmental Sci & Tech, Unit Sign Contract Worth 288 Mln Yuan In India
text:
BRIEF-Zhejiang Tuna Environmental Sci & Tech, Unit Sign Contract Worth 288 Mln Yuan In India

Stock Markets 41 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 14:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Zhejiang Tuna Environmental Sci & Tech, Unit Sign Contract Worth 288 Mln Yuan In India Sept 27 (Reuters) - Zhejiang Tuna Environmental Science & Technology Co Ltd : * SAYS IT AND INDIA UNIT SIGN CONTRACT WORTH ABOUT 288 MILLION YUAN ($40.44 million) WITH INDIA'S DB POWER
